title: Why i cant take aftershock
body:
Hello 
so every time i take aftershock on nunu . when i entre the game a message apears telling me that 
"Your aftershock rune has been exchanged to Grasp of the undying" WTF????????????

replies.body: Because even the strongest slow still isn't a hard CC. He would need a root, stun, taunt, charm, fear, displacement, knockup, knockdown, or stasis to trigger it.
Because Nunu cannot proc Aftershock (except in the fringe case of activating a blast cone underneath an enemy champion)? He has no hard CC.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7U5r1zF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-03T20:03:10.816+0000)
>
> Because Nunu cannot proc Aftershock (except in the fringe case of activating a blast cone underneath an enemy champion)? He has no hard CC.

his E works with  aftershock

It does not. 
Aftershock requires an immobilzing spell like a stun, snare, root, or taunt. A slow is an impaired movement ability, not an immobilizing one. 
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Aftershock
it doesn't. His E should never proc it. Slows do not immobilise champions unlike stuns, airbornes and snares/roots.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7U5r1zF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-03T20:03:10.816+0000)
>
> Because Nunu cannot proc Aftershock (except in the fringe case of activating a blast cone underneath an enemy champion)? He has no hard CC.

That is an amazingly smart bit of idiocy protection on the part of riot.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7U5r1zF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-03T20:03:10.816+0000)
>
> Because Nunu cannot proc Aftershock (except in the fringe case of activating a blast cone underneath an enemy champion)? He has no hard CC.

E can proc aftershock i used to go with aftershock
His E is a slow. Aftershock works with knock ups, stuns, binds, displacement, etc. It does NOT work with slow. You may have been able to take it before but it did NOT do anything for you.

That's because Nunu can't use aftershock. He doesn't have any hard CC in order to activate it, so it would be a total waste of a slot. As a result, the game automatically switches it to something that you could get at least a moderate amount of use out of.
